items.sentence: Be serious, humble, polite, calm and truthful. Don't say too much, and never talk about things that you don't understand.
Even now, I occasionally think I'd like to see you. Not the you that you are today, but the you I remember from the past.
I realize that I may not be the most desirable man in the world, but I still hope that you'll consider going out with me.
In all her pompous majesty, carried on the shoulders of the entire football team, stood the de facto queen of the school.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom was not aware that he wouldn\'t be allowed to enter the museum without his parents.
